frame.name: First_rank
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Item</fen> is located at the top end of a scale of importance or social rank (or some other <fen>Attribute</fen>) in comparison to other members of a <fen>Contrast_set</fen> (usually, implicit) that is otherwise similar in kind to the <fen>Item</fen>. Oftentimes, the limits of the <fen>Contrast_set</fen> are determined by an expression of the <fen>Limits_of_consideration</fen>.
<ex>The <t>main</t> <fex name="Item">problem</fex> is that the administration has not yet clarified "Regime change." <fex name="Contrast_set">INI</fex></ex> <ex>Oh, he had a great many concerns -- <t>chief</t> <fex name="Contrast_set">among them</fex> <fex name="Item">his own boredom</fex>.</ex> <ex>Their <t>primary</t> <fex name="Item">objective</fex> <fex name="Limits_of_consideration">in Bosnia</fex> was bringing about a lasting peace. <fex name="Contrast_set">INI</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Item
FE.definition: <def-root>An <fen>Item</fen> is the foremost thing in the <fen>Contrast_set</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Limits_of_consideration
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the domain (usually temporally or spatially defined) within which the <fen>Item</fen> is primary among its kind. <ex>The <t>foremost</t> band <fex name="Limits_of_consideration">in the world of the 1960's</fex> was clearly the Beatles.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Contrast_set
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Contrast_set</fen> is a group of entities similar to the <fen>Item</fen> out of which the <fen>Item</fen> is the most preeminent. <ex>Our discussion has raised a number of issues, <t>foremost</t> <fex name="Cos">among them</fex> time.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Attribute
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Attribute</fen> of the <fen>Item</fen> which is under consideration.
<ex>The <t>foremost</t> ski lodge <fex name="Attribute">in size</fex> is Lassen.</ex></def-root>
